Title: High School DxD BorN: Ishibumi Ichiei Kanzen Kanshuu! Mousou Bakuyou Kaijo Original Video
Description:
['Specials included with the Blu-ray/DVD volumes.', '\n', '\n', '\n', '\n',
  1. "Rias and Akeno's Womanly Battle!?" - Rias and Akeno compete to see whose sexy roleplay has greater appeal for Issei. (3:18)
  2. "The Church Trio's Underwear, Amen!" - Irina, Xenovia, and Asia compare their "battle underwear". (3:11)
  3. "Koneko's Healing Sage Arts, Meow" - Koneko has a healing technique, but does Issei have the wrong idea? (3:44)
  4. "Levia and So" - Tsubaki can't decide between two magical girl costumes and convinces a reluctant Sona to try one one. (3:29)
  5. "Steamy Grayfia" - Grayfia isn't quite herself when she and Issei accidentally encounter each other in the bath. (3:24)
  6. "Rossweisse's True Teaching Story" - When Rossweisse helps Issei study for a test, it proves difficult to avoid inappropriately distracting him. (3:07)
]
Characters: ['Gremory, Rias', 'Himejima, Akeno', 'Hyoudou, Issei', 'Toujou, Koneko', 'Quarta, Xenovia', 'Argento, Asia', 'Shidou, Irina', 'Leviathan, Serafall', 'Lucifuge, Grayfia', 'Sitri, Souna']
Voices: ['Hikasa, Youko', 'Itou, Shizuka', 'Kaji, Yuki', 'Taketatsu, Ayana', 'Taneda, Risa', 'Asakura, Azumi', 'Uchida, Maaya', 'Shimizu, Ai', 'Seto, Saori', 'Takamori, Natsumi']
